registers.name: Abstract Commands
registers.register:
Access the register specified by \Fregno. If \Fwrite is set, copy data from \Rdatazero into the register. Otherwise copy data from the register into \Rdatazero. (If XLEN is greater than 32, more {\tt data} registers are involved.)
Number of the register to access, as described in Table~\ref{tab:regno}.
0: Read the register.
1: Write the register.
